name: Add courses to Edusign from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a selected Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new course in Edusign. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AIiod-lBAJWm5ZfvRC2G2KV2UUdRV16TbQJdVDW3N5E/edit?usp=sharing).
